data.text: The potential of artificial intelligence to help achieve the #GlobalGoals is the focus of Thursday's World Telecommunication & Information Society Day. Follow @ITU for updates & see: https://t.co/56hJDK5iMl #WTISD https://t.co/rDt2Pfc0La

LGBTI RIGHTS = HUMAN RIGHTS

On Thursday's Int'l Day Against Homophobia, Transphobia & Biphobia and every day, support fair treatment of lesbian, gay, bi, trans & intersex people: https://t.co/mDohyvklfr https://t.co/AlnWpUQdy9

Thursday's World Telecommunication & Information Society Day highlights how artificial intelligence can be used positively for everyone. Get @ITU info here: https://t.co/56hJDJNHUN #WTISD https://t.co/fv9Y62jfDU
Human rights are for everyone – no matter who you are or whom you love. Thursday is Int'l Day against Homophobia, Transphobia & Biphobia https://t.co/Ljui9GqDYQ https://t.co/Qgadm5EBoC

Peace and compassion are the focus of Muslims around the world during this month of Ramadan. 

Ramadan Mubarak to all celebrating! https://t.co/74GlKRFSPF

"True peace requires building bridges, combating discrimination & standing up for the human rights of all the world's people." -- @antonioguterres. 

Info on Wednesday's Int'l Day of Living Together in Peace: https://t.co/4KkIfjsj9I https://t.co/u8XTtGqrJ4
Find out how @WFP's support & training for smallholder farmers in Zimbabwe helps one man see new opportunities ⬇️ https://t.co/LsiEUftRz1
On Wednesday's Int'l Day of Living Together in Peace & every day, help us promote peace, tolerance, inclusion, understanding & solidarity around the 🌍. https://t.co/zfygRvEUpY https://t.co/3cENjo6Lhi

50M metric tonnes of e-waste  = 125,000 jumbo jets ✈️ 

That's how much e-waste is produced each year. Find out what you can do about it from @UNEnvironment: https://t.co/ZN0F10QdZn https://t.co/KnoFLWXH8T
“The int’l community must step in and prevent war,” UN envoy @nmladenov tells emergency meeting of Security Council following deadly clashes along the Gaza Strip. https://t.co/rFI1aXlcwd

After #WWII, the UN was established to save succeeding generations from the scourge of war. More on Wednesday's Int'l Day of Living Together in Peace ➡️ https://t.co/zfygRvEUpY https://t.co/7S8nhTE1WH

50 years ago, family planning was declared a human right. Yet today, 200M women & girls still lack access to voluntary family planning. More info here: https://t.co/xGgizizg5z #FP50 https://t.co/zB8f3ZxKPp

"The world is seeing a groundswell of climate action.
It is clear that clean energy makes climate sense.
But it also makes economic sense."

-- @antonioguterres at @R20_AWS https://t.co/K9Tu8fsUbw https://t.co/Ju7myyPyVz

Happy  Inernational #DayofFamilies!  No  matter  how  big  or  small  your  family  may  be,  let’s  celebrate  the ❤️,  care & support  they  can  provide.  https://t.co/ubzh3ERxKj via @UN_Women https://t.co/5Fxyww9XyX

Why do societies continue to undervalue fathers & overburden mothers?

My overriding priorities since taking office are preventing conflicts & crises, and mobilizing efforts to implement the #GlobalGoals. @UNODC has a crucial role to play. -- @antonioguterres https://t.co/EltLQYiUQk https://t.co/jeBdDVAzuA

Racism
Xenophobia
Intolerance

Epic journeys. The beauty of migratory birds is matched by their importance to the environment. Preserving these species will create a better future for all. #WorldMigratoryBirdDay #GlobalGoals https://t.co/LJ6Bwc6Nml
~40% of all migratory birds are facing extinction. Saturday's #WorldMigratoryBirdDay highlights need for int'l action to stop this alarming trend. https://t.co/OhMv1hR1cp https://t.co/gRxv7w5Pex

"Wherever I am, I try to lift up at least one more woman."
